Uses of Package
com.oracle.tools.runtime.java.virtualization

Packages that use com.oracle.tools.runtime.java.virtualization
com.oracle.tools.runtime.java.process   
com.oracle.tools.runtime.java.virtualization   
 

Classes in com.oracle.tools.runtime.java.virtualization used by com.oracle.tools.runtime.java.process
VirtualizedSystemClassLoader
          A VirtualizedSystemClassLoader is a URLClassLoader that defines a VirtualizedSystem, that of which is used to encapsulate and isolate System-level resources for classes loaded with the said ClassLoader.
 

Classes in com.oracle.tools.runtime.java.virtualization used by com.oracle.tools.runtime.java.virtualization
AbstractDelegatingOutputStream
          An AbstractDelegatingOutputStream is a FilterOutputStream that delegates output to an appropriate VirtualizedSystem OutputStream.
VirtualizationClassLoader
          A VirtualizationClassLoader is a VirtualizedSystemClassLoader that uses the child-first / parent-last strategy for resolving and loading classes.
VirtualizedMBeanServerBuilder
          A VirtualizedMBeanServerBuilder is an MBeanServerBuilder that isolates MBeanServers with in a VirtualizedSystem.
VirtualizedMBeanServerBuilder.ConnectorFactory
          A JMXConnectorFactory defines factory methods to acquire JMX Connectors for clients and servers.
VirtualizedMBeanServerBuilder.RmiRegistryFactory
          A VirtualizedMBeanServerBuilder.RmiRegistryFactory provides the ability to create Rmi Registrys.
VirtualizedSystem
          A VirtualizedSystem encapsulates state and functionality typically defined by the Java System class.
VirtualizedSystemClassLoader
          A VirtualizedSystemClassLoader is a URLClassLoader that defines a VirtualizedSystem, that of which is used to encapsulate and isolate System-level resources for classes loaded with the said ClassLoader.
